user_text:
I went through those steps but did not get a refund. 

I want the refund because I did not mean to subscribe to this app. Your customer service policy says there is 14 days to get a refund, and I and within that (app was downloaded on the 20th, I asked for a refund on the 28th) 

I was charged by your company and want my money back. See attached photo.
answer:
Hello,

My name is Vlad, I’m from the support team. Thank you for reaching out.

I understand that you were charged for a subscription you did not intend to activate and that the charge occurred within the 14‑day refund window. Because the purchase was made through the App Store, all billing and refund decisions are handled by Apple. To obtain a refund you’ll need to submit a request directly to Apple:

1. Visit [https://reportaproblem.apple.com](https://reportaproblem.apple.com)  
2. Sign in with the Apple ID that was used to download the app.  
3. Locate the Lensa charge in your purchase history and click **“Report a Problem.”**  
4. Select the appropriate reason (e.g., “I was charged by mistake”) and submit the request.

If Apple approves the refund, the amount will be credited to your original payment method within 5–10 business days (depending on your bank).

If you need help locating the purchase in Apple’s system or have any other questions, please let me know. I’m here to assist.

Best regards,  
Vlad

user_text:
Hi, 
Please delete my account and all my personal data including facial/biometric image data used in training AI models. 
I withdraw my consent for you to use and retain data about my face.
answer:
Hi Daniel,

I’m Vlad from the Lensa support team.  
To delete your account and all personal data—including any facial/biometric images used for AI training—please follow these steps:

1. Open the **Lensa** app on your device.  
2. Go to **Settings** (tap the gear icon).  
3. Scroll down until you see **Delete My Data**.  
4. Tap it, confirm the prompt, and your account plus all associated data will be permanently removed.

If you have created any Magic Avatars, please save them before proceeding, as they will be deleted along with the rest of your data.

Once you’ve completed these steps, let me know and I’ll verify that everything has been removed from our systems.

Thanks for using Lensa.  
Best regards,  
Vlad

answer:

Здравствуйте! Я ошибочно купила подписку на год, увидела у вас предложение с 7 дневной бесплатной подпиской, но у меня сразу списались деньги. Я только скачала ваше приложение и хотела с ним ознакомиться. Прошу помочь мне вернуть средства

answer:

Поскольку подписка была оформлена через App Store, возврат средств можно получить только через Apple.  

**Что сделать:**

1. Откройте приложение «Настройки» → *Ваш Apple‑ID* → «Подписки».  
2. Найдите нашу подписку и нажмите «Отменить подписку» (если ещё не отменили).  
3. После отмены откройте App Store → «Профиль» → «История покупок».  
4. Найдите запись о подписке и нажмите «Запросить возврат» (или выберите пункт “Проблема с покупкой”).  
5. Следуйте инструкциям Apple – в большинстве случаев возврат будет обработан автоматически в течение 24–48 ч.

Если у вас возникнут вопросы при выполнении этих шагов, дайте знать – помогу дальше.

С уважением,  
Влад  
Lensa Support

user_text:
Hello LENSA team,

I have absolutely loved your app for a couple years now and have given you many customers in return.

As I went on to edit one of my photos today with the "Art Styles" filter settings, I couldn't find it.
It's my favorite and makes my photos look like paintings.

I really really hope you didn't get rid of it. That's very upsetting.
It almost makes me want to cancel my subscription with you.

Please explain to me what happened and where that particular filter set went?

Thank you, Sonja Runar

Sonja Runar
answer:
Hi Sonja,

Thanks for reaching out and for being such a loyal user of Lensa. I’m sorry to hear that the “Art Styles” filter is no longer visible.

**What happened?**  
The Art Styles feature was removed in the most recent update because it had a low overall usage rate. We’re constantly refining our feature set to focus on the tools that bring the most value to our community.

**Where can you find similar effects?**  
1. **Prisma** – Our sister app, Prisma, is dedicated to art‑style filters and offers a wide range of painting‑like effects.  
2. **Lensa’s “Creative” section** – Some new artistic presets have been added there that might suit your needs.  
3. **Custom filters** – You can create a custom filter by adjusting the “Style” slider and saving it for future use.

**Next steps**  
- If you’d like to try Prisma, let me know and I’ll send you a direct link to download it.  
- If you prefer staying within Lensa, I can walk you through the new Creative presets that might replace Art Styles.

Please let me know which option works best for you

user_text:
Hi I made some new avatars today and when i went to save one or all it did NOT hive me the option to remove the watermark. Previously all Avatars I made on the app when saving would pop up first to save with or without watermark. So how do I save my Avatars without the watermark

Diagnostics information:
iPhone 14 Pro | iPhone15,2 | 18.5 | 7.2.2 | en
answer:
Hello,

My name is Vlad, I’m from the Lensa support team. Thank you for reaching out.

**How to save avatars without a watermark**

1. **Open the avatar you want to save.**  
2. Tap the **Eraser tool** (the icon that looks like a small eraser).  
3. Use the eraser to remove the watermark from the avatar.  
4. Once the watermark is gone, tap **Save** (or **Share**) to export the avatar without any overlay.

If you’re still seeing the watermark after erasing, please let me know – I’ll need a screenshot of the screen you’re on so I can troubleshoot further.

I’m happy to help if you run into any other issues.

Best regards,  
Vlad

user_text:
Hi
I want a refund for my subscription.
I intended to use the free trial but free trial didn’t apply when I signed through the app
Please issue me a refund
image0.png
Sent from my iPhone
answer:
Hello,

My name is Vlad, I’m from the Lensa support team. Thank you for reaching out.

I see that your subscription was purchased through the App Store. In this case, all billing and refund processes are handled by Apple, so we don’t have the technical ability to issue a refund directly from our side.

**To request a refund:**

1. Open a web browser and go to [reportaproblem.apple.com](https://reportaproblem.apple.com).  
2. Sign in with the Apple ID that was used to purchase the subscription.  
3. Find the transaction for your Lensa subscription in the list of recent purchases.  
4. Click **Report a Problem** next to that transaction, then choose **Request a Refund** and follow the on‑screen instructions.

If you encounter any issues while completing this process, or if you need further assistance after submitting the request to Apple, please let me know. I’m happy to help you track the status or provide additional guidance.

Thank you for your patience, and I’m sorry for any inconvenience this has caused.

Best regards

user_text:
Hi, Nigel McGuinness here.

I've been using your App for a while and it seems that the 'Art Styles' option has been removed.

I've used it to Grade Photos for a while and would still like access to it.

Has it been 'removed' ... or 'moved' to somewhere else in the app?

I thought maybe it was moved to the Magic Avatars section but that doesn't allow for more than face in the photo.

Any help would be appreciated.

Thanks, Nigel :)
answer:
Hello Nigel,

My name is Vlad, I’m from the Lensa support team. Thank you for reaching out.

**What happened to Art Styles?**  
The Art Styles feature was removed from the Lensa app a few months ago because it wasn’t widely used. It hasn’t been moved to another section; it is no longer available in the current version of Lensa.

**What can you do instead?**  
If you’re looking for artistic filters and style‑transfer effects, we recommend trying **Prisma**, another app from our team that specializes in art‑style filters and creative transformations. Prisma is available for both iOS and Android.

If you have any other questions or need help setting up Prisma, please let me know. I’m happy to assist.

Best regards,  
Vlad

answer:
Hello,

My name is Vlad from the Lensa support team.  
I’m sorry to hear that you’re not receiving your free daily save.

**What we can do right now**

1. **Verify subscription status**  
   • Open the app → Settings (gear icon) → Account → Subscription.  
   • Confirm that it shows “Free” or a paid plan.

2. **Clear app data / reinstall**  
   • On iPhone: Settings → General → iPhone Storage → Lensa → Offload App, then reinstall.  
   • This resets any cached limits that may be stuck.

3. **Check for pending updates**  
   • Make sure the app is updated to the latest version (7.2.0).  

**What we need from you**

- A screenshot of the **Subscription** screen in Settings showing your current plan.  
- If you already tried reinstalling, let us know the outcome.

Once we have that information, I can look into any account‑level issues or reset your daily limit.

Thank you for your patience. I’m

Vlad

user_text:
If I pay for the premium version of Prisma, what is the maximum resolution for saved images?
Jon Arrowood
answer:
Hi Jon,

Thanks for reaching out.

With a Premium subscription, the highest resolution you can save is **1280 × 720 pixels (HD)**.

If you need a higher resolution for large prints, let me know and I’ll forward your feedback to the product team.

Best regards,  
Vlad

user_text:
появился лимит в платной версии программы, о котором нигде ранее не упоминалось.

Diagnostics information:
iPhone 14 Pro Max | iPhone15,3 | 26.0.1 | 7.1.1 | ru_UA
DeviceID: 55BEC02A-2E58-4861-824B-53CFE752D27E
UserID: 5b72f894-6a46-41f7-869a-afcef07f4e98
answer:
Здравствуйте!  

Я – Влад из команды поддержки Lensa.

**Что происходит?**  
В платной версии действительно есть ограничение на количество применений AI‑пресетов (≈ 80 раз в день). Это не лимит на сохранение/редактирование фотографий – там всё безлимитно. Ограничение указано на экране оформления подписки.

**Что сделать?**  
1. Проверьте, сколько раз вы уже применяли AI‑пресеты сегодня – если приближаетесь к лимиту, просто подождите до следующего дня.  
2. Если вы уверены, что лимит превышен и сообщение появляется ошибочно, попробуйте выйти из приложения и снова войти в свой аккаунт (Apple‑аккаунт, через который вы оформили подписку).  

Если после этих шагов проблема остаётся – пришлите скриншот сообщения об ошибке, и я проверю ваш аккаунт подробнее.  

С уважением,  
Влад

answer:
**Subject:** Updating Your Email Address – Next Steps

Hi Julie,

Thank you for reaching out. I’m Vlad from the Lensa support team.

**What we can do right now**

1. **Log in with your new email**  
   • Open the Lensa app (or website).  
   • Choose a sign‑in method that works for you – e.g., **Apple, Google, or “Sign in with email.”**  
   • Enter your new address: **jbarnhart10@gmail.com**.  

2. **Transfer your subscription**  
   • Once you’re logged in, let me know by replying to this ticket.  
   • I’ll move your current subscription from the old account (jbarnhart@nc.rr.com) to the new one.

**If you can’t log in with the new email**

- Make sure the account is not already linked to another device or sign‑in method.  
- If you’re prompted to choose a plan, it means the app didn’t recognize an existing subscription. In that case, please confirm:

**Subject:** Updating Your Email Address – Next Steps

Hi Julie,

Thank you for reaching out. I’m Vlad from the Lensa support team.

**What we need to do**

1. **Log in with your new email**  
   • Open the Lensa app (or web) and sign‑in using **jbarnhart10@gmail.com**.  
   • You can use any preferred method (Apple, Google, or email/password).  

2. **Transfer your subscription**  
   • Once you’re logged in, let me know by replying to this ticket.  
   • I’ll then transfer your existing subscription from the old account (jbarnhart@nc.rr.com) to the new one.

**Why we need your confirmation**

Because the old email is no longer accessible, we must verify that you own both accounts before moving the subscription. A quick confirmation that you are the account holder is sufficient.

**If you encounter any issues**

- If the app still prompts you to choose a plan after logging in, it means the subscription hasn’t been transferred yet.
user_text:
I have an account under jbarnhart@nc.rr.com but that email is an old one. My new account is jbarnhart10@gmail.com
How do I update this to access my
account? I do not have access to the old email.
Thanks for your help
Julie Barnhart

Deleting and Reinstalling the App worked.  UNFORTUNATELY I LIST ALL THE PHOTOS THAT HAD BEEN ADDED TO PRISMA.
 
Rick
answer:
**Subject: Re: Photos Missing After Deleting & Re‑installing Prisma**

Hi Rick,

I’m glad to hear that deleting and reinstalling the app resolved the crash issue.  
Regarding the photos you mentioned:

| What happened | What Prisma keeps | What is removed |
|---------------|-------------------|-----------------|
| **Local gallery photos** (photos you saved to your device) | Remain on the phone – reinstalling does **not** delete them. | None |
| **Photos uploaded to Prisma for editing** (the images you sent to the app) | Stored temporarily on our servers and automatically deleted within 24 hours. | These are **not** recoverable after reinstalling. |

If the photos you’re missing were ones you had already saved to your device’s gallery before uninstalling, they should still be there. You can check the Photos app (or your device’s file manager) to confirm.

If you’re referring to images that were only in Prisma (not yet saved locally), unfortunately they cannot

user_text:
Hi team,

I will like to cancel a subscription made on my account, I thought I did the weekly subscription but happened to be the yearly one. I just noticed I’m charged on my other card which I didn’t even use for subscription. Please how do i cancel and get a refund. 


Many thanks
answer:
Hi there,

I’m sorry to hear about the mix‑up with your subscription. To help you cancel and get a refund, I’ll need a few details:

- The email address linked to your Lensa account  
- Whether the subscription was purchased through Apple, Google Play, or a direct payment on our site  
- The card that was charged (the last four digits are enough)

Once I have this information, I can guide you through the cancellation process and submit a refund request on your behalf.

Thanks for your cooperation!

user_text:
Hi team,

I will like to cancel a subscription made on my account, I thought I did the weekly subscription but happened to be the yearly one. I just noticed I’m charged on my other card which I didn’t even use for subscription. Please how do i cancel and get a refund. 


Many thanks
answer:
Hello,

I’m Vlad from the Lensa support team. I’m sorry to hear about the unexpected charge.

**Here’s what you can do:**

1. **Open the Lensa app**  
   Go to *Settings* → *Subscriptions*.  
   You should see the yearly plan listed there. Tap **Cancel Subscription** (or “Manage” → “Cancel”). This stops any future billing.

2. **Request a refund**  
   *If you subscribed through the Apple App Store:*  
   - Visit [reportaproblem.apple.com](https://reportaproblem.apple.com/).  
   - Sign in with the Apple ID that was used.  
   - Find the yearly charge and click **Report a Problem** → choose “I was charged for a subscription I didn’t intend to buy” and submit.

   *If you subscribed via Google Play:*  
   - Open the Google Play Store → Menu → **Subscriptions**.  
   - Select the Lensa yearly plan and tap **Request a refund** (or “Cancel & Refund”). Follow the prompts.

3. **Check your email**  
   After submitting, you’ll receive a confirmation from Apple or Google. Refunds usually appear within 5–10 business days.

If you can’t locate the subscription in the app or the store, let me know which platform (iOS or Android) you used and I’ll look into it further.

Thank you for your patience, and let me know if anything else comes up.
